attributes.action: Introduce minimum staffing levels in Hospitals In Wales & England
attributes.additional_details: In South Wales hospital there are wards where there is only 2 qualified nurses and 2 HCSA's to look after 28 severely ill patients.
attributes.background: Introduce minimum staffing levels in Hospitals to 4 qualified nurses and 4 Health care assistants, currently there are insufficient staffing levels in Wales leading to errors and poor care.

rejection.details:
The NHS in Wales is the responsibility of the Welsh Government is responsible for in Wales. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't take the action you're requesting in Wales. 

The Welsh Assembly has its own  Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:

http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx

If you wanted to start a new petition about hospitals in England, we could look at it again.
